snippet: In a case flecked with suggestions of romantic rage, racial bias and prosecutorial overreach, a bench trial has been granted for Oral Nicholas Hillary, who is accused of strangling Garrett Phillips....
abstract: Opening arguments are set to begin in murder trial of Oral Nicholas Hillary, who is accused of 2011 murder of 12-year-old Garrett Phillips in Potsdam, NY; Judge Felix J Catena will make sole decision on Hillary's fate after defense unexpectedly requested bench trial; case has captured national attention, in part because Hillary, Jamaican immigrant, is black, victim was white, and defense has claimed racial bias on part of prosecution.
lead_paragraph: In a case flecked with suggestions of romantic rage, racial bias and prosecutorial overreach, a bench trial has been granted for Oral Nicholas Hillary, who is accused of strangling Garrett Phillips.

headline.main: Opening Statements to Start in Trial, Without Jury, Over Potsdam Boy’s Murder
headline.print_headline: Opening Arguments to Start in Trial, Without Jury, Over Potsdam Boy’s ’11 Murder
